scripts.deploy: sam deploy --template-file package.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --parameter-overrides CollectionName=${COLLECTION_NAME} UserPoolName=${USER_POOL_NAME} DocumentUploadBucketName=${SIGN_UP_S3_BUCKET} SignInUploadBucketName=${SIGN_IN_S3_BUCKET}
scripts.bd: npm run check-env && npm run package && npm run deploy
